DOC.brief_summary: This study follow objective : • To validate capability μ-Cor System monitor ECG , Heart Rate ( HR ) , Respiration Rate ( RR ) , Posture Activity healthy human subject . The μ-Cor validation demonstrate two body location : 1 . Side location ( left armpit ) study arm 1 , 2 . Front location ( upper leave chest ) study arm 2 An FDA-cleared comparator device use support validation study device .
DOC.brief_title: Vital Signs Validation Study μ-Cor System ( ViVUS Validation )
DOC.detailed_description: This study follow objective : • To validate capability μ-Cor System monitor ECG , Heart Rate ( HR ) , Respiration Rate ( RR ) , Posture Activity healthy human subject . The μ-Cor validation demonstrate two body location : 1 . Side location ( left armpit ) study arm 1 , 2 . Front location ( upper leave chest ) study arm 2 An FDA-cleared comparator device use support validation study device .
DOC.criteria: Subject least 21 year age old . Subject willing able sign Informed Consent Form . Subject healthy , able willing complete preparation step study procedure . Exclusion Criteria Female subject know pregnancy unsure pregnancy status . Subjects allergy and/or skin sensitivity electrode hydrogel and/or acrylic base adhesive . Subjects skin breakdown area device placement require . Subjects chronic lung disease asthma . Subjects history cardiovascular disease . Subjects diabetic . Subjects live kidney failure dialysis . Subjects history liver failure . Subjects know malignancy ( i.e . cancer patient ) . Subjects implanted device thoracic region
